setTickerSymbol: Set stock ticker symbol to trade
setCFDTickerSymbol: Set CFD ticker symbol to trade
setSharesFromCash: Set shares to trade based on a cash value and the current share price
setShares: Set shares to trade to a fixed value
setSharesFromPosition: Set shares to trade equal to your current position
buy: [sellStopPrice] Place limit order to Buy at Ask +3 cents with attached Stop Loss
sell: [buyStopPrice] Place limit order to Sell at Bid -3 cents with attached Stop Loss
buystop: [buyStopPrice] [sellStopPrice] Place LONG Buy Stop Limit order at buyStopPrice +11 cents Limit with attached Stop Loss
sellstop: [sellStopPrice] [buyStopPrice] Place SHORT Sell Stop Limit order at sellStopPrice -11 cents Limit with attached Stop Loss
reversePosition: Place limit order to Reverse position
closePosition: Place limit order to Close 100% of position
closeHalfPosition: Place limit order to Close 50% of position
closeThirdPosition: Place limit order to Close 33% of position
closeTwoThirdsPosition: Place limit order to Close 67% of position
limitTakeProfitHalf: [limitPrice] Place Limit Order to Take Profit on 50% of position
limitTakeProfitThird: [limitPrice] Place Limit Order to Take Profit on 33% of position
setRisk: Modify Risk Per Trade Percentage. Default: 1.25%
setEquity: Modify Equity (N% of Equity is Risk Per Trade) Default: Available Funds of account
saveState: Save current state as default state

welcomeMessage: Welcome to TradeBot. Enter '?' to show the menu.
multipleAccountsWarningFormat: Multiple accounts found so account with highest Available Funds selected: {0} with {1} Available Funds.
listPositionsFormat: {0} {1}, AvgCost: {2}, MktPrice: {3}, MktValue: {4}, UnPnL: {5}, RePnL: {6}, A: {7}
